001package edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.service;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.model.entity.User;
004import java.util.Collection;
005import java.util.Collections;
006import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
007import org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter;
008import org.springframework.security.authentication.UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken;
009import org.springframework.security.core.authority.SimpleGrantedAuthority;
010import org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt;
011import org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.JwtClaimNames;
012import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
013
014@Service
015public class UserConverter implements Converter<Jwt, UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken> {
016
017  private final AbstractUserService userService;
018
019  @Autowired
020  public UserConverter(AbstractUserService userService) {
021    this.userService = userService;
022  }
023
024  @Override
025  public UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken convert(Jwt source) {
026    Collection<SimpleGrantedAuthority> grants =
027        Collections.singleton(new SimpleGrantedAuthority("ROLE_USER"));
028    User user = userService.getOrCreate(source.getSubject(), source.getClaimAsString("name"));
029    return new UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken(user, source.getTokenValue(), grants);
030  }
031
032}
